cn.description:
这个应用程序有一个简单的功能：检测灵体的存在并捕捉它们。
一旦捕获，它会显示东方佛教的六字箴言作为保护和祝福用户的形式。

• 这个应用程序可能会吓到你。
• 所有传感器都在一个页面上。
• 一个真正的雷达来追踪异常。
• 高精度的EMF（电磁场）探测器。
• 拍照并检测其中的异常 - 可以自由开启或关闭。
• 更详细的说明在应用程序中可用；只需触摸?按钮即可访问它们。

警告：
如果您是一个非常敏感或容易受到惊吓的个体，请考虑不使用这个应用程序并将其关闭。在使用此应用程序时，请不要将自己置于危险中。如果您认为自己处于危险之中，请立即关闭应用程序，联系某人寻求帮助，并立即离开该地区。

免责声明：
请记住，由于应用程序使用设备的不同传感器，因此我们不能保证任何鬼魂检测的准确性，这在很大程度上取决于终端的精度和质量。由于超自然活动无法用科学证明，我们不能保证该应用程序与真实的灵魂进行通信。这个应用程序的结果无法得到科学验证。

cn.description:
瓦尔登 是一款专为个人打造的日程管理应用，它包含了待办事项，目标进度管理，以及笔记备忘录功能，得到了众多用户的喜爱，并且获得了 App Store 官方编辑推荐、PriceTag等知名自媒体的推荐，为了获得最佳体验，我们专门为 iPhone、iPad、Mac 做了适配，希望你会喜欢这款简洁却强大的应用。

我们的用户群体覆盖十分广，无论你是学生还是上班族，都可以用 瓦尔登 来管理自己每天的工作学习日常，安排每天的工作任务，记录自己的目标，写下自己灵光乍现的想法，甚至，使用番茄钟专注当下。

瓦尔登 不追求 All in One，只希望把精力都聚焦在核心功能上，始终把体验放在第一位，去除不必要的繁冗。

-----------------
※ 日历模块
- 拥有精心打造的日历时间轴，可实现任务的自由拖拽调整，
- 支持月视图显示
- 支持同步系统自带 日历

※ 任务中心（以 GTD 工作法为核心理念）
- 普通模式下，显示 今日、明日、已过期 的任务列表，对最近的日程安排有一个大致的了解，聚焦当下的任务
- 四象限模式，按任务的优先级分块显示，任务的轻重缓急清晰呈现，同时还提供了一套独创的优先级评估系统，帮助用户在安排任务时做到心中有数
- 重复任务设置，支持基本的重复计划（每日、每周、每月），提前提醒，可设置任务截止日期
- 检查清单（Checklist）和清单模版，可提供简单的任务处理流程
- 任务标题日期时间可智能识别提取，效率满满
- 收集箱（Inbox）功能，这是 GTD 方法论不可或缺的一环，记录一些还未决定何时安但可能会遗漏的任务或者想法
- 内置 番茄钟，严格按照番茄工作法设计，支持灵动岛和实施活动，支持设置每日番茄目标、休息时间、任务，除此以外，还支持正计时功能，

※ 目标进度
- 支持目标量化，可设置目标分组，并且提供可视化进度展示（进度条&进度环），清晰追踪目标进度
- 支持目标趋势图，可以回顾自己过去一段时间的目标进度变化
- 支持目标进度笔记，可以记录实现目标过程中的一些想法和总结

※ 闪念笔记（备忘录）
- 碎片化笔记、日记记录、灵感记录
- 支持文本、图片功能，融合自定义标签，支持全文搜索标签搜索
- 支持笔记补录功能

※ 小组件（锁屏小组件）
- 支持今日待办、本周待办、月视图、四象限，目标趋势、闪念笔记、年进度等，并提供可交互功能，可直接在小组件勾选完成任务或者更新目标进度，效率进一步提升！

※ 统计中心
提供丰富的汇总数据、直观的图表，方便用户回顾和查询

※ iCloud
支持自动备份，跨设备数据同步

※ 隐私保护
支持 FaceID （指纹）解锁应用

※ 其他
无广告、无后台，免费用户友好，数据完全存储到本地和个人的 iCloud 账户，只有用户本人才可访问数据

-----------------
订阅说明
确认订阅后将向您的 App Store 账户收取费用，订阅以年或月为计费周期。订阅服务将会在当前周期结束时自动续订并收取费用，取消自动续订需要在当前订阅周期结束 24 小时前完成。

hk.description:
In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies.

The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of ​​​​the enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats.

By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end.

During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle.

As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft.

This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game.

### Gameplay

#### Click the screen to fire
The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials.

#### Dynamic aiming and reaction
Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy.

#### Easy restart, continuous challenge
The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game.

#### Unique and interesting painting style
The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment.

#### Endless challenges and fun
Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting.

In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl.

The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward.

In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters.

As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.

hk.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

hk.description:
收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

收服、訓練和養成超過2000隻怪獸，打造專屬於你的隊伍通往勝利之路！超大型的怪物對戰RPG手遊！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。
• 參加每週特殊活動，贏得更多豐富獎勵！

• 本遊戲內容涉及「性」、「暴力」，故建議應列級別為「輔導15歲級」。
• 本遊戲內有提供購買虛擬貨幣、物品等付費服務。
• 注意使用時間，避免沉迷於遊戲。

hk.description:
這個應用程序有一個簡單的功能：檢測靈體的存在並捕捉它們。
一旦捕獲，它會顯示東方佛教的六字箴言作為保護和祝福用戶的形式。

• 這個應用程序可能會嚇到你。
• 所有傳感器都在一個頁面上。
• 一個真正的雷達來追踪異常。
• 高精度的EMF（電磁場）探測器。
• 拍照並檢測其中的異常 - 可以自由開啟或關閉。
• 更詳細的說明在應用程序中可用；只需觸摸?按鈕即可訪問它們。

警告：
如果您是一個非常敏感或容易受到驚嚇的個體，請考慮不使用這個應用程序並將其關閉。在使用此應用程序時，請不要將自己置於危險中。如果您認為自己處於危險之中，請立即關閉應用程序，聯繫某人尋求幫助，並立即離開該地區。

免責聲明：
請記住，由於應用程序使用設備的不同傳感器，因此我們不能保證任何鬼魂檢測的準確性，這在很大程度上取決於終端的精度和質量。由於超自然活動無法用科學證明，我們不能保證該應用程序與真實的靈魂進行通信。這個應用程序的結果無法得到科學驗證。

In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies.

The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of ​​​​the enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats.

By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end.

During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle.

As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft.

This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game.

### Gameplay

#### Click the screen to fire
The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials.

#### Dynamic aiming and reaction
Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy.

#### Easy restart, continuous challenge
The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game.

#### Unique and interesting painting style
The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment.

#### Endless challenges and fun
Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting.

In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl.

The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward.

In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters.

As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

hk.description:
Sisli sokaklar, karanlık sırlar ve her köşede gizlenmiş bir hikâye.

Vaka No: 1937, sizi geçmişin büyülü ve tehlikeli atmosferine götüren seçim tabanlı bir dedektiflik oyunudur. Bu interaktif deneyimde, usta dedektif Refik Bey’in yerine geçiyor, İstanbul’un dört bir yanında çözülememiş vakaların peşine düşüyorsunuz.

Her karar, olayların gidişatını değiştiriyor. Kimi zaman bir şüpheliyle yapacağınız konuşma, kimi zaman basit bir delil, sizi bambaşka bir sona götürebilir. Aynı hikâyeyi farklı yollarla yeniden oynayabilir, gizli sonları ve olay örgüsündeki farklı dallanmaları keşfederek İstanbul'un karanlık geçmişine ışık tutabilirsiniz.

İlk vakanı çözmeye hazır mısın?

為了將您的體驗提升到全新層次，我們帶來了三項令人驚艷的新功能：
• 強化版 VoiceOver：提供更清晰、詳盡的描述，讓視障使用者操作更方便。
• 智慧預測搜尋：即時建議，幫助您在數秒內找到想要的內容。

mo.description:
我們的應用實時連接到YouTube，讓您播放任何視頻，並擁有專為您設計的獨家功能！
主要功能亮點：
• 鎖屏播放：在後台持續收聽您視頻的音頻。
• 浮動播放（畫中畫）：在觀看視頻時使用其他應用。
• 睡眠定時器：設置自動關閉，安心放鬆。
• 循環模式：無限循環播放您喜歡的視頻。
此外還包括：
• 可切換字幕
• 播放速度控制
• 質量選擇和全屏模式
• 智能搜索，即時建議（預測搜索）
• 上傳日期篩選：按天、週、月或年
FyTube非常適合不想錯過任何喜歡主題視頻的用戶。
盡情探索、播放並享受您喜愛的內容——無干擾！

特別功能
浮動播放
永不停播！有了此功能，您可以在使用其他應用時繼續觀看視頻。
只需進入全屏模式，點擊畫中畫按鈕——它是播放器頂部的第二個圖標。
無論打開哪個應用，您的視頻都會浮動在螢幕頂部！

鎖屏播放
無中斷收聽！
即使螢幕關閉，也能繼續享受視頻音頻。非常適合開車或休息時聽音樂、播客或喜歡的曲目。
如何激活？
只需鎖定設備螢幕，即刻會看到後台播放器。
點擊播放——音頻將持續不斷。

睡眠定時器
安然入睡——應用會自動停止！
啟用此功能後，視頻將在您設定的時間後自動停止。非常適合睡覺或小憩，無需擔心忘記關閉。
如何激活？
點擊定時器按鈕，選擇運行時間，就完成了。
放鬆，剩下的交給應用！

循環模式
反覆播放您喜歡的視頻！
啟用此功能，視頻會自動重複播放任意次數。
怎麼知道它是否開啟？
啟動時圖標會變紅。
（支援VoiceOver：會提示開啟或關閉狀態。）
非常適合歌曲、冥想或任何您喜歡反覆播放的內容！

需要幫助使用這些功能？訪問：fydub.com/fytube

mo.releaseNotes:
- 在主選單中新增了一個選項: 檢視怪獸時優先顯示其技能
- 修正了某些怪物在預覽視窗中顯示過小的問題
- 獎勵箱上的計數器將始終顯示未領取獎勵的總數
- 新增怪獸故事
- 新增怪獸和現有怪獸技能平衡調整
- 修復各種錯誤
mo.description:
收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

收服、訓練和養成超過2000隻怪獸，打造專屬於你的隊伍通往勝利之路！超大型的怪物對戰RPG手遊！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。
• 參加每週特殊活動，贏得更多豐富獎勵！

• 本遊戲內容涉及「性」、「暴力」，故建議應列級別為「輔導15歲級」。
• 本遊戲內有提供購買虛擬貨幣、物品等付費服務。
• 注意使用時間，避免沉迷於遊戲。

neomonsupport.gameplay@zigzagame.net

https://www.zigzagame.com/terms/
隱私政策:
https://www.zigzagame.com/Privacy-Policy/

mo.description:
這個應用程序有一個簡單的功能：檢測靈體的存在並捕捉它們。
一旦捕獲，它會顯示東方佛教的六字箴言作為保護和祝福用戶的形式。

• 這個應用程序可能會嚇到你。
• 所有傳感器都在一個頁面上。
• 一個真正的雷達來追踪異常。
• 高精度的EMF（電磁場）探測器。

• 更詳細的說明在應用程序中可用；只需觸摸?按鈕即可訪問它們。

如果您是一個非常敏感或容易受到驚嚇的個體，請考慮不使用這個應用程序並將其關閉。在使用此應用程序時，請不要將自己置於危險中。如果您認為自己處於危險之中，請立即關閉應用程序，聯繫某人尋求幫助，並立即離開該地區。

Aynı hikâyeyi farklı yollarla yeniden oynayabilir, gizli sonları ve olay örgüsündeki farklı dallanmaları keşfederek İstanbul'un karanlık geçmişine ışık tutabilirsiniz.

İlk vakanı çözmeye hazır mısın?

tw.description:
In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies.

The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of ​​​​the enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats.

By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end.

During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle.

As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft.

This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game.

### Gameplay

#### Click the screen to fire
The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials.

#### Dynamic aiming and reaction
Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy.

#### Easy restart, continuous challenge
The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game.

#### Unique and interesting painting style
The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment.

#### Endless challenges and fun
Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting.

In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl.

The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward.

In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters.

As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.

advisories: 偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
tw.releaseNotes:
- 在主選單中新增了一個選項: 檢視怪獸時優先顯示其技能
- 修正了某些怪物在預覽視窗中顯示過小的問題
- 獎勵箱上的計數器將始終顯示未領取獎勵的總數
- 新增怪獸故事
- 新增怪獸和現有怪獸技能平衡調整
- 修復各種錯誤
tw.description:
收服和養成超過2000隻以上的精美動畫後製完怪獸，成為傳說中的訓練師！並和世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！

收服、訓練和養成超過2000隻怪獸，打造專屬於你的隊伍通往勝利之路！超大型的怪物對戰RPG手遊！

夢幻怪獸是一款讓人欲罷不能的RPG手遊，主打四對四特殊回合制戰鬥，最多16隻怪獸組成一個隊伍。獨創對戰系統和上百種技能讓每一次戰鬥更加熱血和多元。終極進化你的怪獸，釋放它們的真正力量，主宰PvP賽場！您準備好進入夢幻怪獸的世界了嗎？

▶遊戲特點:
●  收集怪獸
• 捕捉和養成1000隻以上的精美動畫後製怪獸！
• 完成終極進化，釋放真正潛能。
• 收集特殊素材，解放秘密技能！

●  打造隊伍
• 用16隻怪獸，研發終極隊伍。
• 特殊回合制戰鬥，擊敗你的宿敵！
• 超過100種怪獸技能，打出致命Combo！

●  成為傳奇
• 征服六個聯盟、挑戰至上四強。超過60個小時的冒險故事！
• 探索六座島嶼和無數地下城！
• 隨著劇情，揭發隱藏在百年帝國維羅希亞華麗外表下的黑歷史。

●  Online對戰
• 和來自世界各地的玩家PvP對戰！
• 超過100支線上任務。
• 參加每週特殊活動，贏得更多豐富獎勵！

• 本遊戲內容涉及「性」、「暴力」，故建議應列級別為「輔導15歲級」。
• 本遊戲內有提供購買虛擬貨幣、物品等付費服務。
• 注意使用時間，避免沉迷於遊戲。

- Fixed an issue where some monsters appeared too small in the preview window.

us.description:
Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP!

Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs!

Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge?

▶Features:
●  Build your Monster Collection
• Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters!
• Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential.
• Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power!

●  Form a Battle Strategy
• Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters.
• Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles!
• Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Horror/Fear Themes
us.description:
This app has a simple functionality: detecting the presence of spirits and capturing them. 
Once captured, it displays the Six Syllable Mantra from Eastern Buddhism as a form of protection and blessing for the user.

• This application might scare you.
• All sensors are on one page.
• A real radar to track anomalies.
• Highly accurate EMF (Electromagnetic Field) detector.
• Take photos and detect anomalies within - can be freely turned on or off.
• More detailed instructions are available in the app; simply touch the ? button to access them.

Warning:
If you are a very sensitive or easily scared individual, please consider not using this app and turning it off. Do not put yourself in danger while using this app. If you believe you are in danger, please close the app, contact someone for help, and leave the area immediately.

Disclaimer:
Please remember that we cannot guarantee the accuracy of any ghost detection since the app uses different sensors of the device, and thus it greatly depends on the terminal's precision and quality. Since supernatural activities cannot be scientifically proven, we cannot guarantee that the app communicates with real spirits. The results of this app cannot be scientifically verified.

In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies.

The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of ​​​​the enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats.

By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end.

During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle.

As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft.

This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game.

### Gameplay

#### Click the screen to fire
The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials.

#### Dynamic aiming and reaction
Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy.

#### Easy restart, continuous challenge
The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game.

#### Unique and interesting painting style
The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment.

#### Endless challenges and fun
Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting.

In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl.

The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward.

In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters.

As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

us.description:
Foggy streets, dark secrets, and a hidden story at every corner.

Case No: 1937 is a choice-based detective game that immerses you in the magical yet dangerous atmosphere of the past. In this interactive experience, you step into the shoes of master detective Refik Bey and chase unsolved cases throughout Istanbul.

Every decision alters the course of events. Sometimes a conversation with a suspect, other times a simple clue can lead you to a completely different ending. You can replay the same story in different ways, uncover hidden endings, and explore branching narratives to shed light on Istanbul’s shadowy history.

Are you ready to solve your first case as Refik Bey?

tr.description:
Become a Legend! Capture over 2000 Animated Monsters and Duel in Real-Time PvP!

Form your team and battle for victory! Capture, train, and evolve to become the champion in one of the biggest monster battling RPGs!

Neo Monsters is an addictive strategy RPG that features epic 4v4 battles between two teams of up to 16 monsters. The unique turn-based battle system allows you to come up with powerful chain strategies by combining hundreds of abilities. Hunt down the strongest monsters and harness their power, then take the battle online to dominate in exciting PvP battles and leagues! Are you ready to take the challenge?

▶Features:
●  Build your Monster Collection
• Capture and evolve over 1000 fully animated monsters!
• Train your monsters and unleash their deadly potential.
• Collect evolution ingredients to create the ultimate power!

●  Form a Battle Strategy
• Build the ultimate team of up to 16 monsters.
• Defeat your opponents in epic turn-based 4v4 battles!
• Create devastating combinations from hundreds of abilities.

●  Become the Champion
• Conquer six Leagues and take on the Grand Champion in 60+ hours of adventure!
• Explore multiple islands and dungeons on your journey.
• Follow the story to uncover the truth behind your late uncle’s atrocity.

●  Take the Battle Online
• Duel players from around the world in PvP leagues!
• Complete 100+ online missions.
• Take on weekly updated events to unlock big rewards.

tr.releaseNotes: Forest rangers discovered some bugs, and they used their superpower to wipe them out.
tr.description:
## Top productivity app in 136 countries. More than 2 million satisfied paying users. Featured in Apple's "Amazing Apps" TV commercial.
## Staying focused with the cutest gamified timer. 
## Over 1,500,000 real trees were planted on Earth by our users.  

"Forest works well, and if your goal is to be more in the moment, ignore your phone and actually talk to your friends when you are with them, this is the app for you."— The New York Times 

"In order to establish new, better habits, it's helpful to engage with tools that make it easier to reinforce them. For anyone looking to curtail their phone usage, the Forest app might be for you."— Business Insider

If you want to temporarily put down your phone and focus on what’s more important in real life, you can plant a seed in Forest. As time goes by, this seed will gradually grow into a tree. However, if you cannot resist the temptation of using your phone and leave the app, your tree will wither. 

The sense of achievement and responsibility will encourage you to stay away from your phone, and will help you make better use of your time. Stop getting distracted by your phone, make you self-motivated and get more things done.

Stay focused, Be present! 

STAY FOCUSED
• A interesting way to help you beat phone addiction and overcome distraction
• Turn your focused moments into a lush forest.
• Create personalized Allow Lists for different situations. Non-allowed apps will be blocked. (iOS 16 or above)

GET MOTIVATED
• Earn rewards and unlock more than 90 new tree species and white noises.
• Share your forest and compete with friends and users around the world.
• Plant trees along with friends & family.
• Unlock achievements and earn extra rewards.
• Plant real trees on Earth and protect the environment with tree-planting organization Trees for the Future.

STATISTICS
• Manage your own tags and view detailed statistics of your time distribution.
• Browse your weekly, monthly and even your yearly big forest.
• Track your focused time in the Apple Health App.
• Track your daily phone usage and screen time.
• Recall memories of your planting journey with our brand new Forest Timeline!

It's never too late to build up productive habits! 

NOTICE
• Forest is compatible with iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch, and can be used across these iOS devices with a one-time purchase. The full app with the aforementioned features is available on iPhone and iPad; on Apple Watch you can view live planting session and today’s focus stats. To download or unlock a non-iOS version, it requires a separate purchase. By logging into the same account, your data can be synchronized across all platforms.
• Due to iOS limitations, the Allow List feature is only available on iOS/iPadOS 16 or above. If you’re using a device running iOS/iPadOS 15 or below, your tree will wither when you leave Forest during a planting session.
• Due to budget constraint, the number of real trees each user can plant is limited to five. We will be introducing limited time events that will allow users to plant more real trees. Please follow our social media page or check the in-app announcement for more updates.
• There is only one version of Forest on the App Store. Other apps that are similar and mimics Forest are not developed by the Forest team. Thank you for your support!

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/forestapp.cc/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/forestapp_cc
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/forest_app/

We also provide browser extensions. Find out more on www.forestapp.cc

tr.description:
Five-star tower defense with unrivaled depth and replayability. Now with rewarded leaderboards for even more fun and challenge!

The Bloons are back and this time they mean business! Build awesome towers, choose your favorite upgrades, hire cool new Special Agents, and pop every last invading Bloon!

Featuring 2 brand new Towers, cool Special Agents, glorious retina graphics, original Tracks and Special Missions, a whole new tier of Specialty Building upgrades, and the powerful Monkey Lab to further upgrade your towers, Bloons TD 5 delivers hours and hours of fun, challenging play to fans and new players alike.

Hours and Hours of Awesome Gameplay:
* 90+ Tracks
* 21 powerful towers with Activated Abilities and 2 upgrade paths
* 10 Special Agents
* Online Co-op play
* Multi-track Odyssey Challenges
* Boss Bloon Special Events
* 10 Special Missions
* 250+ Random Missions
* Daily Challenges
* New Bloon enemies - tougher Camos, Regrow Bloons, and the fearsome ZOMG
* 50+ Game Center Achievements and Challenges
* iCloud Support
* 3 different game modes
* Freeplay mode after mastering a track
* 4 difficulty settings and family-friendly theme so anyone can play

And that's just the beginning - regular planned updates will keep Bloons TD 5 fresh, fun, and challenging for many months to come. Now it's time to pop some Bloons!

Remember to save to iCloud after each victory or purchase to save your progress. 

iPad version also available - check out Bloons TD 5 HD for full screen UI awesomeness!

tr.releaseNotes: Forest rangers discovered some bugs, and they used their superpower to wipe them out.
tr.description:
## Top productivity app in 136 countries. More than 2 million satisfied paying users. Featured in Apple's "Amazing Apps" TV commercial.
## Staying focused with the cutest gamified timer. 
## Over 1,500,000 real trees were planted on Earth by our users.  

"Forest works well, and if your goal is to be more in the moment, ignore your phone and actually talk to your friends when you are with them, this is the app for you."— The New York Times 

"In order to establish new, better habits, it's helpful to engage with tools that make it easier to reinforce them. For anyone looking to curtail their phone usage, the Forest app might be for you."— Business Insider

If you want to temporarily put down your phone and focus on what’s more important in real life, you can plant a seed in Forest. As time goes by, this seed will gradually grow into a tree. However, if you cannot resist the temptation of using your phone and leave the app, your tree will wither. 

The sense of achievement and responsibility will encourage you to stay away from your phone, and will help you make better use of your time. Stop getting distracted by your phone, make you self-motivated and get more things done.

Stay focused, Be present! 

STAY FOCUSED
• A interesting way to help you beat phone addiction and overcome distraction
• Turn your focused moments into a lush forest.
• Create personalized Allow Lists for different situations. Non-allowed apps will be blocked. (iOS 16 or above)

GET MOTIVATED
• Earn rewards and unlock more than 90 new tree species and white noises.
• Share your forest and compete with friends and users around the world.
• Plant trees along with friends & family.
• Unlock achievements and earn extra rewards.
• Plant real trees on Earth and protect the environment with tree-planting organization Trees for the Future.

STATISTICS
• Manage your own tags and view detailed statistics of your time distribution.
• Browse your weekly, monthly and even your yearly big forest.
• Track your focused time in the Apple Health App.
• Track your daily phone usage and screen time.
• Recall memories of your planting journey with our brand new Forest Timeline!

It's never too late to build up productive habits! 

NOTICE
• Forest is compatible with iPhone, iPad and Apple Watch, and can be used across these iOS devices with a one-time purchase. The full app with the aforementioned features is available on iPhone and iPad; on Apple Watch you can view live planting session and today’s focus stats. To download or unlock a non-iOS version, it requires a separate purchase. By logging into the same account, your data can be synchronized across all platforms.
• Due to iOS limitations, the Allow List feature is only available on iOS/iPadOS 16 or above. If you’re using a device running iOS/iPadOS 15 or below, your tree will wither when you leave Forest during a planting session.
• Due to budget constraint, the number of real trees each user can plant is limited to five. We will be introducing limited time events that will allow users to plant more real trees. Please follow our social media page or check the in-app announcement for more updates.
• There is only one version of Forest on the App Store. Other apps that are similar and mimics Forest are not developed by the Forest team. Thank you for your support!

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/forestapp.cc/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/forestapp_cc
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/forest_app/

We also provide browser extensions. Find out more on www.forestapp.cc

tr.description:
Foggy streets, dark secrets, and a hidden story at every corner.

Case No: 1937 is a choice-based detective game that immerses you in the magical yet dangerous atmosphere of the past. In this interactive experience, you step into the shoes of master detective Refik Bey and chase unsolved cases throughout Istanbul.

Every decision alters the course of events. Sometimes a conversation with a suspect, other times a simple clue can lead you to a completely different ending. You can replay the same story in different ways, uncover hidden endings, and explore branching narratives to shed light on Istanbul’s shadowy history.

Are you ready to solve your first case as Refik Bey?

tr.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies.

The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of ​​​​the enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats.

By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end.

During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle.

As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft.

This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game.

### Gameplay

#### Click the screen to fire
The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials.

#### Dynamic aiming and reaction
Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy.

#### Easy restart, continuous challenge
The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game.

#### Unique and interesting painting style
The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment.

#### Endless challenges and fun

As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting.
